resources.string: Tronix 2021 is a social platform to connect all somophores of Electronics and Communication Engineering Department of VNIT to a common network.
Main Section is a forum / newsfeed section where users can add posts, add any question for discussion, comment on posts by others, take part in discussions and much more.

Study Section of app is a common library for all users where they can access to assignments, notes, previous year question papers and practicals. Users can download these content in form of pdf from here and then access it offline later.

Third section of app is attendance manager to enable students to keep a track on their attendance in various subjects. It automatically fetches daily class schedule from server and hence no need to manually setup your timetable.
App is currently under development mode and many other features are yet to be added soon! Feedback and suggestions are welcome!
For suggestions, complaints and feedback about application, fill the contact form below. Developer team will respond soon!
